File libci.c
There is one thing: the prototypes or signatures of CUDA functions have modifiers CUDARTAPI which is __stdcall and __host__ which is __location__(host) as defined in file /opt/cuda/include/host_defines.h The question is if this has any impact on the interposed calls. I guess not. But I might be wrong.
